website_summaries.verdict: For gamers who like long gaming sessions and have a 4K monitor.
pros: Liquid cooling system for the CPU keeps it from overheating during extensive gaming
Processor is fast and can handle serious multitasking
cons: Some internal components look generic or cheap

customer_reviews.title: One Star , update.
customer_reviews.text: Had it one day and the and the liquid CPU cooler pump quit pumping. they sent me a replacement and it has been working, two case fans died so I replaced them with some RGB fans.
customer_reviews.author: meehhh...

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for an hour.
customer_reviews.text: Booted up great.. Super excited for the good deal. Then slowly the video card stopped working? I assume that's what happened because it was only a black screen after an hour of using it just fine. Sl Support was slow and wanted me to return to them. Never! Back to Amazon. Won't buy from this builder again.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Millwood

customer_reviews.title: Avois
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a total of 5 hours until I smelled smoke and the system turned off and was unable to be turned on again. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hodgdon

customer_reviews.title: SCAM, was sent USED when ordered new.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a new computer. Arrive used, mouse dirty and worn, items just floating around in the box, user id already setup so I couldn't even log in. What a SCAM. Completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: James Campbell

customer_reviews.title: some come out fine. Mine is overheating constantly for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Playing the lottery with these cyberpower pc's, some come out fine. Mine is overheating constantly for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: a good computer without a premium price
customer_reviews.text: This review is for CyberpowerPC's Gamer Xtreme VR GXiVR8220A PC. I've had this product for over a month, with daily use. It's a great value with parts cheaper than assembling it yourself. The build quality and cable management are great and the ease of having it just ship to your house assembled is great. It shipped in a sturdy box, with plenty of cushion. On startup, there was no bloatware or adware to harass you. This is a great option if you're looking for a price to value solution. Simply put, with the market as it is now, these prebuilt systems are an excellent way to buy a good computer without paying a premium price.
customer_reviews.author: Amander

customer_reviews.title: Problems with crashing
customer_reviews.text: Received the computer, launched it and installed Steam and the computer instantly crashed with blue screens. Have had nothing but issues with it. When the computer runs everything plays super ridiculously well until it crashes.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee

customer_reviews.title: Was working fine at first
customer_reviews.text: Was working fine at first, in but less than 30 days the liquid cooling system started to leak and fried the graphic card. On top that, CyperpowerPC made me pay for shipping to ship it back to them to fix it. When we called them to report the cooling system leak, they didn't seem surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Oh

customer_reviews.title: Failed within first hour.
customer_reviews.text: Paid for one day shipping only to receive the package 9 days later. Worked great for literally 1 hour now the computer won't turn on. I'm thinking the power supply failed...great product! Amazon is replacing with another, will post if fails again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse performance but I question how long it will last.
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this PC I was totally blown away with what I got for the money. Especially because I purchased it at the height of the GPU drought. Sadly, the cooling unit has started producing very strange sounds just a couple months after owning it and I am outside of the product support window. It is a very capable machine and performance-wise I am still totally blown away, but the fact that it is giving me any kind of worry after owning it for less 3 months is concerning.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lee Rosser

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on sale
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on thanksgiving sale for around 1500. storage is a little low for me so i'll be adding another hdd. parts are random as far as im aware but mine came with msi gtx 1080 aero (blower), ddr 2400, 600w 80+ psu, asrock pro 4 z370 mb. no optical drive or wifi. case came with 4 120mm fans and cybper power liquid branded cooler for cpu. wd blue hdd 1tb and wd green ssd 240gb. Overall a great price on the discount. If you care about quality parts you can build your own but will almost definitely be more expensive. 100% recommendation to buy on a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer. I bought this PC about 3 months ago and and it runs everything smoothly like a beast! I have tried multiple games with computer such as PUBG, Black Desert Online, Destiny 2 etc. and runs everything smoothly with high frame rates. Since buying this PC I have only ran into one problem, when the PC starts it makes a low to medium humming sound for about a min then goes away. This however has not affected the performance at all so it doesn't seem like a big deal. Overall a great product and I am thoroughly enjoying it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Curiously curious

customer_reviews.title: Back case fan was fault. Had to replace it, but they sent me one for free.
customer_reviews.text: After less than one week the back case fan has started acting up. When I boot it or wake it up from sleep it'll make a loud rattling noise for a while. Tapping gently on it seems to settle it down. I've had similar problems before with the case fan on my last computer but it took about 2 years for that case fan to start acting up which raises concerns about the build quality of the case itself. However, I called Cyberpower's tech support and they immediately shipped me a replacement fan for free. Overall I am fairly satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good computer, crappy peripherials
customer_reviews.text: The computer overall is very good. It's fairly cheap atm considering graphics card prices and works well. If graphics card prices go down I suggest building your own, but it's a good box. Good: It's pretty It's got a 1080ti It's pretty much as advertised Meh: 2400 mhz ram 1 Tb of storage for 2k is a bit pricey Bad: The mouse kinda stinks, scroll wheel isn't great The keyboard does just stink. The volume down button got stuck the first time I pressed it. The enter button is weirdly shaped and makes typing harder, and in general the keyboard just feels crappy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: So happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This Beast is incredible and priced to sell as it is constantly unavailable due to people buying it up immediately. Came nicely packaged, tested, and already setup with Windows 10 installed. Looks great, has all high performance hardware and is surprisingly quiet! Highly recommend if you are looking for a prebuilt powerhouse. Hard to build your own for this price.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: After rebooting for the first time after doing initial Windows ...
customer_reviews.text: After rebooting for the first time after doing initial Windows setup the machine no longer posts. CMOS clear appears to have no effect, can't even get a Bios screen. Probably going to return since I don't want to spend the time debugging this which was the entire point of not putting it together myself.
customer_reviews.author: David Landau

customer_reviews.title: Not Half bad!
customer_reviews.text: being a pre-built, i never have high expectations. However, upon arrival, i checked out everything, and looked over wiring. Everything was solid, and tight, stock fans are crazy crazy quiet even under load/benchmarks (cinebench R15). the AIO cooler, isn't fantastic, but it was able to withstand , for myself, an overclock of up to 4.9ghz without an issue, max temps at 87C even under load. everything worked well. and honestly, pretty good performance. Price could be a touch lower? but, overall, pretty satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality, but it would be better to advertise the components.
customer_reviews.text: Since everyone is posting the specs of the machine they got, I will follow along. - Motherboard MSI Z370 A Pro - Graphics card MSI 1070 Armor Series - Memory EVO Potenza - Power Supply Cant Remember brand The build quality is good, the only complaint is the memory. It does not seem to clock up to what its supposed to. I see other people's builds on here and feel like I got shafted a little on the motherboard, but that is life I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Mark

customer_reviews.title: Its a monster...belongs in a cage
customer_reviews.text: This is a gamers dream. All that and then some. Clean, tight, and powerful. This is a 5 year rig without question. The only issue that I would address is the PSU (power supply unit) which is adequate at 650 watts but would rather see a 1000 watt. Packaging was bullet proof so to speak and it was no more than 10 minutes from doorstop to desktop. Two thumbs up to the folk at Cyberpower.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, fast, quiet... concentrate on your task,, don't wait on your machine
customer_reviews.text: Have been limping along with an i3 to handle my photo editing needs... but jumped into videography and definitely needed something more to handle the graphics requirements. This unit definitely makes a huge difference... now I can quickly edit photos and videos much more quickly... it used to be frustrating to wait to render videos or load up photo edits... much more productive and satisfying... I can concentrate on content instead of waiting for my machine to catch up. Hmmm... might even jump into some gaming in my free time : ) Unit looks dope too... the fans, red lights, graphics, etc Called customer support with a few startup questions and they were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: GA Long Beach

customer_reviews.title: 1080TI powered
customer_reviews.text: I got this computer to replace my 4770k/980ti setup. I went from being able to run PUBG on ultra at 70fps to a steady 100~fps. No issues with the computer, though they could improve the quality of the included mouse and keyboard. I ended up to just using my current setup and setting the OEM ones aside as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rice

customer_reviews.title: great for gaming. almost amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Excellent machine, works as intended, and put together correctly as far as a I can tell. All components are present as advertised. The case is easy to work with for expansion purposes, and is nice to look at. Prompt delivery and good packaging. Cons: The only one I can think of is that the mother board is the cheap ASRock z370 Pro4, which has worryingly small heat sinks if you're thinking of overclocking, and has a wonky BIOS. Would recommend this if the price drops for a holiday or something. Or if you don't want to overclock, as far as my limited knowledge can tell.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet setup, runs great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer to reconstruct with some different parts as a custom build since it was cheaper than buying the parts I wanted (especially 1080 Ti) by themselves. I turned it on to make sure it works and run some baseline tests and it is a really solid build. It could use more RAM to keep up to par with the other parts in the computer, but has two empty slots for new cards. Sweet setup, runs great, quiet, looks cool, I don't know what else you'd want.
customer_reviews.author: Sup dude

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Darn Sweet Build
customer_reviews.text: Very much enjoying this PC so far. It was delivered on time and everything was where it should have been inside the case. It's been a major step up from my previous build, and I'll be adding an m2 drive tomorrow to make it even better. The only complaint I would have is that there isn't a parts list sent with the PC.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Great price for specs
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the specs. 4.5/5 stars. I was looking to build my own machine, but graphic card prices are through the roof right now! I feel this was a great value for the money. I was pleased to see it came with an EVGA 1080 Ti GPU and like the stylish box/lights and glass side panel. It seems to run quite cool without a lot of fan noise. The mouse and keyboard leave a little to be desired, but both work fine. Overall I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Awesome so far
customer_reviews.text: Just received my CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Xtreme VR GXiVR8200A Gaming PC. It was packed well and delivered in good shape. Unpacking was fine. Computer started right up and has worked flawlessly. It is very quiet for having so many fans. The lighting is awesome. Cooling looks great. Hard to rate duribility since I just got it. Ease of use is great. I wish it had a DVD player but I bought a cheap external for it. Great looking computer. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: MOstbloom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing PC
customer_reviews.text: Just with in the few days in which I've had this PC it is an immediate upgrade over my previous laptop I was using, it runs amazingly smooth and is able to multitask significantly more than what I'm used to. My game was able to smoothly run on Epic settings and still be able to have multiple windows running in the background. Not to even mention the great feeling Keyboard and RGB Mouse that came for free with my purchase of the PC. I would recommend this specific PC to anyone if it's in your budget.
customer_reviews.author: ALEX

customer_reviews.title: Doing Mixed Reality VR beautifully. This is a great box for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Doing Mixed Reality VR beautifully. This is a great box for gaming. I'm running a Oculus Rift with 4 Sensors, Webcam, OBS, and multiple game windows for mixed reality recording and this pc hangs tough. I'm supersampling at 2.0. I've not overclocked because up to now, I've not needed to. I did clean up windows for gaming. This machines a work horse, it's a beast. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Burgess

customer_reviews.title: No bells or whistles
customer_reviews.text: This machine is built for gaming...great equipment in a simple package. If you are looking for a good processor and good graphics card and prefer to shop your other equipment, this is a good deal for you. One thing I was worried about with this unit was the red fan lights. Because it is in my living space, I didn't want something tacky lighting up. It's not that bad when it is on, but it actually goes all black when it is goes to sleep and looks pretty nice. So far I'm very pleased overall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Extreme VR GXiVR8080A2 and couldn't be happier with this machine. It is blazing fast, liquid cooled, overclockable and comes with an Intel i7-8700K 3.7GHz processor with 16GB DDR4 RAM, an NVIDIA GTX 1080 Ti with 11GB, 240GB Solid State Drive, 1TB hard drive and of course it comes also with the mandatory keyboard and mouse. It looks amazing and it is surprisingly quiet. I have it on the right side of my desk where I can see the awesome NVIDIA video card and its 4 fans thru the glass side panel. If you are looking for gaming PC I would highly recommend you consider one from CYBERPOWERPC.
customer_reviews.author: Luis G Molina

customer_reviews.title: What a PC!!!!! Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is rocking fast and I love it. I do video editing in 4K with drone footage and photography too, and this machine really rocks. I didn't realize it was going to be so big... Not a problem just take note of the size dimensions before you buy to make sure it fits in a computer slot. Keyboard isn't my fav choice and the space bar is already kinda squeaky but I am gonna ditch it anyhow. With all those fans I thought this was going to be the loudest computer i've ever owned. Nope! It's as quiet as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Mazur

customer_reviews.title: Fast, looks good, no CD drive, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly and the tower had a protective foam pack inside to protect the internals (graphics card). Easy to set up and came with a nice mouse and keyboard. Runs great, overkill for what I needed but of course I'm able to play games like FO4 on Ultra. USBs on top of the machine make it easy to use. Only possible issue is no CD drive which is funny because in the box you get 2 CDs for drivers. Worth the price so far, no defects or problems!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: I quite enjoy it. Pros- Very good graphics
customer_reviews.text: I've had this computer for over a week now, I quite enjoy it. Pros- Very good graphics, fast cpu speed, it came with all parts said, looks spectacular, and it super good for the american price, and is very quiet cons- when running games like Fornite on ultra settings it can get quite hot after a bit but otherwise is fine, the top bar is a bit broken but that didn't affect me as much so if your using headphones plugged into the computer than you may want a long cord, the glass get finger prints sometimes and it need Ethernet. In all this is a very good PC and would recommend to anyone that doesn't want to build one.
customer_reviews.author: ray van raamsdonk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price. Only minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Good set of chips Great video card Price is legit Games and Solidworks runs on high resolution Very quick start up Fans low-to-medium loudness Cons: Keyboard that comes with is very squeaky Plugged into the audio jack, the whole jack assembly came loose and had to open up case and secure screws with better screws I had, redo some of the cabling zip ties Overall, very good PC for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Jalapenobob

customer_reviews.title: Nice value, but be aware of the heating issue
customer_reviews.text: My configuration was i7-8700k processor with 240GB SSD, 1TB HDD, and GTX 1080 Ti. Overall, it has all the components listed in the spec and cable assembly looks nice and clean. My only concern is the MSI Armor 1080TI GPU, which has infamous heating issues. Pros: - Computer comes clean without any extra software installed - Works well with VR set (Oculus Rift) - Nice bang for the buck Cons: - Has MSI Armor 1080 TI component, which is known for its heating problem (Runs over 80 degrees) - Loud & noisy fan sound - Mouse & keyboard are not my style.. - No built in speakers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: - Easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: - Easy to setup and use. Also good packaging. - I use it to play on PUBG, GTA V and The witcher 3 Looks Great in High Setting. - Runs smoothly and stays pretty cool. - Nice LED lights. Most definitely recommend this product..Worth it for the price. A cheap high end gaming PC.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Runs any game on ultra, super fast start up
customer_reviews.text: An amazing computer so far. I've never had an SSD before, and love how it boots up very quickly. All my games can run at ultra now and handles pubg very well. I was hesitant about the case from the pictures but when I finally saw it in person I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Redd.Chris

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty great. this is great for lazy people who ...
customer_reviews.text: it's pretty great. this is great for lazy people who don't want to set up their stuff. mine came with a EVGA 1080ti card which is great. the price is pretty competitive. totally worth it for me. have had no problems, except i don't like the mouse it came with... not that it's bad.
customer_reviews.author: lord of bears

customer_reviews.title: BEST Investment EVER! I love this computer!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I purchased such a beast online without building it myself, but I couldn't have built it better. From the packaging to the setup, the product was in amazing condition! The only silly thing I thought was the use of a sticker to tell you where the power source was...getting that sticker off the case wasn't fun. Overall, this computer ran from the get-go with amazing speed and handles my intense game design needs out of the box. I added an additional SSD without any issue. 10/10 would buy from CyberPower PC again. Great job guys! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Long

customer_reviews.title: Just Got this Gaming PC very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Just Got this Gaming PC very happy with it. did a Bench Test and this thing screams. The only downside is the WDS SSD is not to great that why I gave it 4 stars. but overall this PC is top notch. They also sent me the EVGA 1080 ti GPU which made me supper happy. Played PUBG at Ultra 144 FPS. :) UserBenchmarks: Game 123%, Desk 89%, Work 93% CPU: Intel Core i7-8700K - 97.5% GPU: Nvidia GTX 1080 Ti - 159.6% SSD: WDC WDS240G2G0A-00JH30 240GB - 39.3% HDD: WD Blue 1TB (2012) - 103.4% RAM: Samsung M378A1G43EB1-CRC 2x8GB - 81.7% MBD: MSI Z370-A PRO (MS-7B48)
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty solid rig
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty solid rig. Booted on the first try, and I was good to go! Hard drives/SSDs are mounted in a compartment separate from what you can see through the glass, so you'll have to go through the other panel for access. Both sides do have thumb screws, so it's not a pain to open up. Small disappointment that the PSU isn't modular, but the case has nice cable management to hide the rest so you don't see extra wires through the glass. Would've been nice to have a 480 GB SSD instead of the 240 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD, but it's not the worst thing in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer, no bloatware
customer_reviews.text: Very good computer. Very top of the line GPU, great 6-core Intel CPU, and enough memory and storage for me. Will run just about anything. Seems to be room for upgrading RAM and storage. No bloatware on the PC, one advantage of buying computers online, as opposed to stores like Best Buy. I suspect, I will not be needing an upgrade for a long time. Coming with a nice mouse and keyboard is also a good plus. However, there was a small issue dealing with the shipping styrofoam, some of it got stuck on the fan of the GPU card. Which I easily removed with a toothpick. But not so easily off the fabric cable inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive setup!
customer_reviews.text: WOW - Screaming machine!! IMy old comp was dying and this was my choice as a replacement. I never realized how loud my old comp was until I replaced it - This thing is so quiet! Set was fast with no issues. The Video card was dislodged from shipping but that was an easy fix. The only thing was that I had to make a bracket for adding another HDD to it.....
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Watercooler fans didn't work but the line wasnt connected
customer_reviews.text: It works well for what I needed to do. The only complaint I have is the water cooler fans in the back did not work at all. I had to get on the other side of the tower where al the wires are at. I noticed there was a cable that was called power and it wasnt hooked up to anything. So I had to follow the fan lines and I had to connect it to the power line. I am not a computer person at all but I was able to figure it out. So, now everything works like it supposed too.
customer_reviews.author: Aprel C.

customer_reviews.title: Great upper mid-range gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Meets all expectations, particularly impressed by how securely packaged it was. Only setup required was removing little foam insert in the case and driver installation, no loose cables or anything even. As some have pointed out the specs are set in stone but the exact brand of components may vary - the trade-off being that they leverage buying in bulk and economy of scale to put out a machine that for the most part is even less than what you'd pay for the sum of individually purchased components, and on top of that you don't have to spend the time shopping and assembling. Includes mouse and keyboard which are pretty nice quality by 'free with computer' standards.
customer_reviews.author: trrp7c

customer_reviews.title: Value, Performance, Clean Build
customer_reviews.text: I've had this machine for a month and it's been great. Good value for the specs. Very fast boot up and way more performance than I probably need, but hey, nothing exceeds like excess. Inside the case has good cable management and very clean build. I'm not a big LED person when it comes to computer cases, but it's tasteful and not overdone. It does have a total of 5 fans so it's not completely silent but about as quiet as you could expect. One of the fans rattled a bit but a couple drops of oil made it quiet again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D.

customer_reviews.title: The Beast from the East
customer_reviews.text: This PC is absolutely beautiful, when I built my old PC years ago... It pales in comparison to the detail here. The computer was breeze to set up and the included mouse and keyboard are wonderful. The PC was running pretty recent drivers out of the box and only needed the GPU driver updated. This machine is also very sturdy and feels like it could be used to crush watermelons... though I wouldn't go around doing that with a $2,000 gaming machine.
customer_reviews.author: NerdShark

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had a better SSD and a motherboard with better audio for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I attached many pictures so that others can see what I got in this computer. I wish it had a better SSD and a motherboard with better audio for my 5.1 surround sound. The cpu cooler is not as good as my corsair one, so I may try to switch it over if it's compatible. I got this during the black friday week when all the prices are low. Paid $1,499.99 at the time (Nov. 2017). It's running everything I throw at it. I have a 144hz monitor at 1440p resolution. It runs all games smoothly, including skyrim, gears of war 4 and overwatch. Overall I'm satisfied with this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: The security log-in was very easy to set-up and use
customer_reviews.text: I had needed a new computer for several years. After checking around I decided to order the CyberpowerPC. First, it arrived so quickly, at least 4 days earlier than I expected. The quick-start instructions were right on point, and in no time at all I was back on-line. The security log-in was very easy to set-up and use. Everything is working just great and has the speed and power that I was expecting. My gaming now has no lag, and the controls are easy to use. The mouse controls are well designed and fit my hand. Finally, with the addition of lights on the tower, keyboard, and mouse, this computer is just fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ettinger

customer_reviews.title: Good gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: The computer can run very complex games on it such as GTA on high settings, and Rust on the highest graphics quality possible. It also runs Minecraft the smoothest out of all of my friend's computers which is also very nice. The computer is quiet and does not heat up. My last computer was extremely loud and made my room a sauna so I am very thankful that this PC satisfies all of my needs.
customer_reviews.author: coolguy5467

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I used to play video games with ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expected!!! I love it. I used to play video games with a laptop. While I got this, I can tell that I get better with video games not because my skills are improving, but this PC is faster which I got more time to react! I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Vincenttthan

customer_reviews.title: I'm more than happy with this machine
customer_reviews.text: I'm more than happy with this machine. What a beast. An i7-8700k and a 1080ti; what's not to love? Does not matter to me that there is no provision for installing an optical drive, if I need one, I'll go external. Some people don't like that the fans are lit up red; I personally don't mind. If you're looking for a monster, this is definitely a monster.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming computer.
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this machine back in March of 2018. Some time has gone by, and I am happy to report that this machine rocks it! There is not a AAA title I have found that will even cause a stutter. It is insanely powerful and super quiet. The only thing, I may do in the short term is upgrade the memory from 16 gig to 32 gig. I love this machine so much, I purchased another gaming PC from Cyberpower on Amazon over Black Friday. A review on that computer will be posted shortly. If your thinking of getting a PC, buy Cyberpower! You'll be glad that you did.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Mason

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good computer. Seems to be very stable. Started it up, with a few clicks had windows 10 setup, Looks good, very quiet, so far I'm pleased with its performance. My only con would be the gaming mouse as I am left handed, and have to hold it gently to avoid inadvertently hitting buttons. I will get a new mouse asap. Other than that, great job Cyberpower PC
customer_reviews.author: Greg K

customer_reviews.title: The Cyberpowerpc Gamer Xtreme VR Gaming system was perfect. I try to build a system by buying ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an upgrade for my current system, The Cyberpowerpc Gamer Xtreme VR Gaming system was perfect. I try to build a system by buying components but it would go over the budget I wanted to spend, then I saw this system on Amazon. I read the reviews and did some research. The Geforce 1080TI and the Intel proccessor was the main reason i got this system. The case very nice and well built. Wiring was good, but it might be hard to install another SSD. The only negative thing is there is no DVI for the video card and also no motherboard manual. I would recommend this system to anyone who wants to game.
customer_reviews.author: Rickey Chow

customer_reviews.title: The price is worth it, would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I received my PC yesterday and spent most of the night setting it up (downloading windows updates and redownloading my Steam games), and now that it's full set up, I'm in love. Runs like a charm, pretty darn quiet, and I can run practically all my games at Ultra settings above 60 FPS. My only complaint would be that the keyboard is missing one of the extra side keys (I think it's the one for muting audio), but that's a super minor thing compared to how awesome it is. 9/10 overall, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: if at first you dont suceed try again!
customer_reviews.text: upon recieving my first tower, upon taking it from the box i noticed that upon placing it on my desk that it was very wobbly. upon inspection found case to be bent on the bottom from where the person who put together pc had over tightened some screws/ rivets on the bottom of the case causing it to bow and bend. i immediately asked for a replacement and it was dealt with in a fast and painless fashion. upon recieving the second unit everything looked great and is working great. cant beat the hardware thats inside it for the price you pay. so other than the first one being defective from the factory i am pleasantly pleased!
customer_reviews.author: R. Woodson

customer_reviews.title: The good: Water cooled fast CPU and nice graphics card ...
customer_reviews.text: The good: Water cooled fast CPU and nice graphics card that allows me to edit 4 and 6k footage with ease. The bad: No wifi or bluethooth? Maybe I was used to mac I don't need to worry about those things. If you're expecting a computer with amenities like bluetooth you will be disappointed. I have also had boot-up issues from day one where sometimes I get a black screen and have to restart it because it won't wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Jewett

customer_reviews.title: PC was great. Only problem I had was that I was ...
customer_reviews.text: PC was great. Only problem I had was that I was sent a MSI Aero GTX 1080ti which had no DVI port. Since my 144hz monitor only had a DVI and HDMI port, I was limited to playing on 60hz. I tried using a display port to DVI cable but was still limited to 60hz. Hence, I had no other option but to return the whole PC. Only if cyberpowerpc/Amazon would list the entire specific parts in the computer so we could research on it before buying.
customer_reviews.author: BillyZee

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the PC for optimal gaming and it runs beautifully. First thing I did with it was stress ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the PC for optimal gaming and it runs beautifully. First thing I did with it was stress test the unit and the performance was spectacular! Another added note would be that it is incredibly quiet for the amount of power that is being produced which makes me very happy. Originally, I ordered this PC due to my relatively enjoyable experience from an "alienware aurora" which in turn was rather loud as far as computers go and the unit was "thermal throttling" so I ended up returning it for this unit. Pleased to say, that was one of the best decisions I've made this month x)
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Turn Key for World Class Gaming!
customer_reviews.text: This computer has everything you need for world class gaming all in one machine. Turned it on, configured Windows and off and running. Do note that it doesn't come with a WiFi card, which isn't essential for gaming but would be a great addition in case a wired connection isn't readily available. I couldn't build a pc with an 11GB GEForce card with all of these bells in whistles for the price. So far, it seems like a great value for everything that you get!
customer_reviews.author: New Mac Guy

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this computer is amazing. From unpacking to firing it up (no bloatware) the only reason for the 4 stars is because when the graphics card kicks in it makes a funny noise...but thats just my luck. Other then that pushing 180 FPS on a 1440p 144hz monitor is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: I have never gamed on a PC before and I am glad I decided to go with Cyberpower. The specs are phenomenal and at a good price for a pre-built PC. Everything shipped exactly how it was published. However, there are certain specifications that are not specified within the advertisement, that gives freedom to Amazon, letting them choose their own parts e.g. power supply. Of course, you can freely change the specs, the tower allows you to freely customize. Regardless, this is a great gaming PC and I will enjoy it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Padin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic PC
customer_reviews.text: Everything is absolutely amazing about this PC. Amazingly fast with everything it does. Had a small issue with the HDD not showing up so I emailed the CYBERPOWER support for other retailers since I had purchased it here through Amazon. Not even 5 minuets after I emailed them I got a reply that ended up fixing the issue. I am extremely happy with the purchase and the support I needed extremely quickly.
customer_reviews.author: P. Alioto

customer_reviews.title: Great rig for great price
customer_reviews.text: This rig is amazing. Easy setup, great specs. I was going to build a computer, but the specs alone (not including the operating system) cost a couple hundred more than what I bought it for. With the extra cash I saved, I am upgrading the storage by adding another SSD. I will say that it is larger than I anticipated, but for the price, it's worth it. Overall I'm very happy with the purchase. I'll update if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: This PC is really awesome. The case looks futuristic and it is very big for proper air circulation. The PC is very fast and I did not notice any delay even on heavy games and high monitor resolution. It has all needed ports. The only thing I had to add is a Bluetooth adapter as the PC did not have it though it is pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase as it will be my beast ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on May 15th and received it next day on the 16th. This has been a powerhouse PC with all games I threw at it. I usually played awfully slow with my old PC, but this one blows it all out of the water. I have tried Conan Exiles (offline and online), Shadow Warrior 2, 7 Days to Die, Sniper Elite 2-4, Dying Light, and other visual hogs without any issue. There are times that games hitch for 1 second, but I think its how the games are coded to load the next areas. I am very happy with this purchase as it will be my beast for a very long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: but it doesn't look like it was secured well
customer_reviews.text: First off, I ordered this with 1 day shipping, it took 6. Amazon reimbursed the 1 day, but that's not the point. Second, the top USB and audio was loose, maybe jolted in shipment. I pushed it back up, but it doesn't look like it was secured well. Besides that, I've been playing this for the last few days on a new 28 inch 60 hz 4k monitor as well. It runs everything at usually 60 frames per second on ultra. Pubg included on the usual 60 fps sometimes 45 to 50 and Witcher 3 sometimes dip in the 50s, but it's not noticeable. It's a beast of a machine like I always wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Teanna burts

customer_reviews.title: Badass rig
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, came with “ASUS 1080 ti Turbo” GPU. Take note, the GPU card runs very hot in stock. I bought a graphics card water cooling kit to help mediate the temperature. Over 250 FPS in fornite, and ultra/very high settings in all games that I have. Everything in this rig is OC friendly.
customer_reviews.author: The Sun Patrol

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming PC.
customer_reviews.text: Great rig! Can't beat the price anywhere even if it were to be built for free. My FPS went from 60 to over 200. Starts up within second(s). I purchased the 4-year warranty (~$100) to make sure this PC will last me for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on the internet, easy setup, no unpleasant surprises!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with Cyber Power. The packaging was neat, the components were clean and well set, and overall, I experienced no surprises. As other reviewers have already explained, given the current demand for mid-to-high end graphics cards, it's more cost-effective to buy pre-built PCs (never thought I'd see the day), and after spending a few hours looking for both individual components and pre-builts, these guys offered the best product IMO. The process to set up this beast was easy: open box, remove protective foam, ensure cables were set, and plug-n-play! Now time for some benchmarks :)
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Palacios

customer_reviews.title: Meets my high expectations for a gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Amazing computer!!! Make sure you merge your unallocated partition for the SSD as soon as you get your computer! The tech support helped me do this in a quick and easy way! It's everything I expected it to be and runs games smoothly on epic settings. For reference, I get about 240-280 fps @1920x1080 on Overwatch epic settings for everything. I couldn't be happier about the purchase. Highly recommend this PC to anyone looking to make a gaming PC but doesn't want to go through the hassle of buying individual parts and doing cable management.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Just got it today, and will probably update this ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today, and will probably update this review as time goes on. So far, it works right out of the box with no issues. Only complaint is what other reviewers have been saying is that this case doesn't seem to have that ventilation when eyeing it. The fans are relatively quiet with just a humming.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful machine! Got it up and running right away!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it the other day. Got free shipping with Prime membership and got it real quick! So far I am loving this thing! I got it hooked up and it started right away. Setup was super easy and the Read First manual made it really easy to do. It's super quiet and I only know it's on because of the lights! I paird it with a MSI G24C curved panel monitor. Oh and the best part is Amazon's price was cheaper than others.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: False advertising (no wifi)
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you know that they say on the description that it has wifi. This is a flat out lie! Got this for my son for Christmas. As I bought it months before I could not return it. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: blazing fast. I run star citizen, dota2, skyrim, path of exile, gta5 and many other games on the highest settings possible and not lag. computer came with a i7 8700 @ 3.7ghz 16gig ram and a msi gtx 1080ti
customer_reviews.author: Josh Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing gaming computer. I've had it for 7 months now and nothing bad has happened so far. There is a problem I faced after a month of purchase, it started to make a rattling noise but it wasn't much of a problem because it went away after 5 minutes and didn't always happen. Another problem I faced was when using it for a long time it heated up my room alot, you can just use a fan to cool yourself down to counter that though. Conclusion: I would definitely recommend this PC to others.
customer_reviews.author: ABudgie

customer_reviews.title: It's a bad boy. I'm disappointed by the extra button near ...
customer_reviews.text: It's GOOOD!! Loaded up Rust on max settings, getting 100 fps. It's a bad boy. I'm disappointed by the extra button near the power button and I have no idea what it does and the "quick start guide" it came with doesn't give detail to it. Makes me wonder what else there is that I have no idea about. Also received it with a dent in the case. :/
customer_reviews.author: Arslan

customer_reviews.title: PC Rocks!  Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: This PC is awesome! Have been using it for the past week now and have not had a single issue. Cyberpower PC is definitely the way to go if your just starting out with PC builds or setups of any kind. The PC is full of power and I was able to run PUBG at 4k 60fps no problem. Keep in mind that the PC does not come with a wireless card, otherwise it is the best PC on the market for its price. 6/7 Tech Reviews
customer_reviews.author: Ro Tech Bro

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Very good computer! The computer came quickly with no damage. The only problem I have is with the keyboard, where the "s" button occasionally gets stuck, but it is not a big deal. 4/5 would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Art007

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gaming Computer, VR ready!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gaming computer. Far exceeded my expectations. We play Dark and Light which our old computer had trouble running with everything set to lower settings, this computer everything is maxed no problems. Everything was great out of the box, shipping was very fast and arrived undamaged. Would definitely recommend to any gamer, I had looked at having one made by Origin but there is no way they could even come close this price for what you got. In fact we bought 2. Would definitely recommend, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rau

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery received within 4 days of ordering via Amazon. So far so good & could not be happier with this CyberPowerPC purchase. I would like to mention that it would have been nice if the mouse & keyboard came with software, the lights never go off. Other than that, G_G
customer_reviews.author: ProgressiveFate

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing! so fast
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for about a month now. It's amazing! so fast, it's already booted up and ready to go as soon as I see my wallpaer pic. I use it for 3d rendering and not gaming. It's perfect for it. Does whay my old computer did in 10 hours and does it in less than an hour. Worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Stormr

customer_reviews.title: Great start up computer!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this computer for over a couple of months now. So far so good. The only issue I ran into was that there was only 1 HDMI plug that works out of the 2. I was a bit disappointed because I really needed the extra HDMI with my docking port. Otherwise, this model works great! I can pretty much max out on everything I'm playing.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisJen

customer_reviews.title: This computer has good components from mainline brands with good synergy (MSI motherboard ...
customer_reviews.text: This computer has good components from mainline brands with good synergy (MSI motherboard and video card). Arrived only needing windows setup on an oem copy, which means there was not *one byte* of bloatware anywhere on the system. We put this machine in out living room attached to our 4k TV with no issues. It runs VR buttery smooth and stays quiet and cool. In this high video card price environment, this prebuilt was cheaper than building it myself. I'd buy this again if I needed another machine.
customer_reviews.author: David Heirtzler

customer_reviews.title: Really nice machine ready to go out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice machine ready to go out of the box. The MSI GTX 1080Ti has only DP and HDMI connections so be sure you get a monitor with a DP connection if you want to push 144hz or higher.
customer_reviews.author: Shane & Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: After having it for about a week, the desktop itself runs great. It is almost quiet and runs games really well at 1080p and some even run well at 4k. It would have been better if there had been a wifi adapter, which does not come with the purchase. Unfortunately, the keyboard arrived with two of the keys (fast forward and lowering volume keys) damaged (they were separated from the keyboard). Edit: Cyberpowerpc sent me a replacement keyboard, along with a headset (for writing this review) free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy set up and super fast speed!
customer_reviews.text: Overall the look is great. The setup was easy and so was the product registration. The mouse is very high quality and you get a free pad for registration and a free set of headphones. Also included is a 1 year subscription to Mcafee anti virus protection. two things that I wasn't prepared for...1, there is no cd drive. 2 there is no wireless card for internet. overall a great pc so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Came ready to go right out the box. Computer is very quiet. It runs the fps stuff like PUBG at the typical settings at 150-200 or so frames. As others have mentioned the mouse is fairly cheap but the keyboard is nice. The operating system came installed on the SSD fyi. Maybe thats industry standard these days? Overall extremely pleased with its performance and look. The easily removable glass case piece is also a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: BLAZIN FAST COMPUTER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I’ve never had a blazing fast computer like this one. It takes under 10 seconds to start Windows and work right away! I’m not a gamer, so I don’t plan to use this PC for ultra realistic computer games. I’m using this PC for Forex Trading, since I’m a day trader and I need heavy data processing, updated second by second, tick by tick... I ordered already 4 monitors, so I can watch the charts at a glance and place market orders. I’ll upload pictures as soon as they arrive. Well done CyberpowerPC guys! My congratulations for this amazing setup.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed Expectations
customer_reviews.text: The Build quality actually surpassed what I was expecting from the photos, they seem to have changed out the source of their parts for the internals and it gives off a much more impressive look than advertised. PC is quick, keeps temperatures cool, and works great. Price is pretty fair for what your getting.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Walters

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Power.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this computer for about 5 months now. It was a huge upgrade as I was coming from an RX480/i5 build. I use this with a 1440p monitor and man, it handles EVERYTHING I throw at it on ultra at the highest frame rates. Everything runs perfectly and it looks gorgeous. It has been a true joy to game on. It is worth every penny. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great PC Performance - Issue with stand/legs wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this PC, one issue I noticed is that the case is wobbly uneven legs. That is the only issue I have at this time. Will contact support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a powerful pc
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as stated on amazon. It was packaged really well,no damage. It looks exactly the same as the pics. everything works as it is supposed to. I got this pc for vr and it handles everything I throw at it easily. I haven't even begun to push the performance this pc is capable of putting out. It is relatively quiet also. The pc is bigger then I wes expecting and I don't like the keyboard very much but other then that this is a great buy for a very capable pc.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Ross

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Rig
customer_reviews.text: I love this desktop. This desktop eats games that my old PC struggled with for breakfast, runs them on the highest settings with no drops in FPS. The cooling system is extremely quite. Anytime I need a new PC CyberPower will be the company I purchase from. Me: Gamer. Developer. Streamer.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Running great straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Running great straight out of the box. Stays quiet even under a lot of stress with games running ultra high settings at 1080p 144hz. Happy also to see the 1080ti inside is an Asus model.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a high end gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Got it for $1899 and couldn't have been happier when I received it. Packaged great and all components worked as they should. High quality parts making this one of the best gaming PCs as far as bang for the buck is concerned on Amazon (as of the writing of this review,)
customer_reviews.author: R1GEL

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sounds great, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I just got this out of the box about an 1 hour ago and it looks amazing. Fired it up without a hitch. Setup was easy with everything already installed. It came with drivers and utility disks in case you do a fresh install or re-install of your OS. I've read reviews about loud fans sounding like airplanes but that is not the case with me as of yet. I'm giving it 4 stars because it's only been on for an hour but I'm impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great PC!
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research, I decided to buy this computer. I have had it for about 2 months. It works great so far. Quiet, blazing fast, looks beautiful, I think it should last for years, so far I consider it well worth the price. The graphic is amazing, very quiet fans , I get great frame rates in all the new games. I can't believe the difference in my graphic since upgrading the computer and my screen. I would definitely recommend this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Fly

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a great computer, the lights are really beautiful that we ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great computer, the lights are really beautiful that we moved it from under the desk to sit on the desk. Overall impressed with the speed. I would say it was a good buy. The only problem is that when the computer turns on, it makes some grumbling noises like a fan is stuck or something but it's really the radiant cooling warming up. The computer is a good buy because the graphics card is a 1080 ti evga 11gb card, which is not in stock at many places. surely you will like this system
customer_reviews.author: honestreview

product_meta.title: CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Xtreme VR GXiVR8440A Gaming PC (Liquid Cooled Intel i7-8700K 3.7GHz, 16GB DDR4, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8GB, 240GB SSD, 1TB HDD, WiFi & Win 10 Home) Black
product_meta.description: Style:GeForce RTX 2070Destroy the competition with the CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Xtreme series of gaming desktops. The Gamer Xtreme series features the latest generation of high performance Intel Core processors and ultra-quick DDR RAM to easily handle system-intensive tasks, such as high definition video playback and gaming. Coupled with powerful discreet video cards, the Gamer Xtreme series provides a smooth gaming and multimedia experience.
feature_bullets: System: Intel Core i7-8700K 3.7GHz 6 Core | Intel Z370 Chipset | 16GB DDR4 | 1TB HDD | 240GB SSD | Genuine Windows 10 Home 64-bit
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8GB Video Card | 1x HDMI | 2x DisplayPort
Connectivity: 6 x USB 3.1 | 2 x USB 2.0 | 1x RJ-45 Network Ethernet 10/100/1000 | Audio: 7.1 Channel | Gaming Keyboard and Mouse
Special feature: Liquid Cooling | 802.11AC Wi-Fi PCI-E Card | Tempered Glass Side Case Panel | RGB Mouse

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars614 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
